data.name: Breaking earth
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the post-apocalyptic world and try to collect all the parts of the space shuttle, which are carefully guarded by mutants and fly away from a dying land, which is immersed in endless lava. Use the radar to find parts, the car to move, and shooting to destroy enemies. The game is difficult, not passable with stunning post-apocalyptic graphics.

Story:
The world of the future is not such a great place. Great progress requires sacrifices,
they turned out to be human past and present. The air became saturated with the poison of factories,
rivers with the corpses of marine life, bare forests without a single tree ...
No one wanted to stay in this damned place, people reached beyond the
Earth and nevertheless successfully founded a new home.
What happened to the planet? Who cares, except for that miserable handful that still
continued to survive among the mountains of garbage, war machines and mutants? True, only to us.
It was possible to exist here, although it was difficult. When the volcanoes began
throwing out ash and rivers of lava - all the outcasts of the human race were smart
enough to understand, this is the end.
The war for resources intensified a hundredfold, everyone wanted
to assemble a ship and leave the planet,
only the problem was that not everyone even in theory
knew the principle of operation of this machine.
From now on, this place is hellish hell. It’s useless to wait for help,
all people are too scared to think and unite in groups to work together,
and the technologies of the military and mutants do not even think about stopping the hunt.
It is necessary to survive and ascend to such a distant "Ark",
it is not known what awaits us there ... But we are simply unable to stay.

data.short_description: This is a fantastic 3rd person stealth shooter. You have to collect parts for a spaceship to fly away from a dying earth in a post-apocalyptic world. Fighting enemies and mutated spiders will not make you bored in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
